title: Bug 7785 - SaveAs Forgets the file type
description: Bug 7785 - SaveAs Forgets the file type. The icon has also changed from the parent javafile icon to a generic file icon.
OB:
1) Open an existing java file
2) Modify it (e.g., move an existing class)
3) Click the SaveAs icon, next to the Save Icon
   A dialog will come up.
4) Browse for a valid container location
5) Type the filename, but ignore the extension, which isn't requested.
6) Click Ok.
   Observe that the Navigator has added the file in the specified location, but with no file extension shown.
EB: The file is, for all intents and purposes, now a generic file, as opening it will prove. The file should be saved with the same extension as the original unless explicitly changed.
SR:
1) Open an existing java file.
2) Modify the file (e.g., make changes to its content).
3) Click on the 'Save As' icon, located next to the 'Save' icon.
4) In the dialog that appears, browse for a valid container location.
5) Type a filename for the file, but ignore the extension.
6) Click the 'Ok' button.
